main_definition: To make or become different; to alter in form, appearance, content, etc.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Altering one's behavior or attitudes over time
meanings_and_examples.example: She has changed a lot since she was younger.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Switching from using money to using credit cards for transactions
meanings_and_examples.example: Many people have started to change their payment habits and rely more on card payments.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To replace one item with another
meanings_and_examples.example: I need to change my car tires before the winter starts.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The process of converting from cash to a digital form, such as when you withdraw money from an ATM
meanings_and_examples.example: When I changed some cash into electronic funds in my bank account.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To remove dirt or stains by rubbing with another substance
meanings_and_examples.example: He needs to change his shirt after getting food on it.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The natural process of aging and growing older over time
meanings_and_examples.example: As we get older, our bodies undergo many changes.
